Chapter 4 Modelo de Salinidad We describe our methods in this chapter. Math can be added in body using usual syntax like this 4.1 math example \(p\) is unknown but expected to be around 1/3. Standard error will be approximated \[ SE = \sqrt(\frac{p(1-p)}{n}) \approx \sqrt{\frac{1/3 (1 - 1/3)} {300}} = 0.027 \] You can also use math in footnotes like this1. We will approximate standard error to 0.0272 4.2 Términos de dispersión por oleaje Some significant applications are demonstrated in this chapter. 4.3 Example one 4.4 Example two where we mention \(p = \frac{a}{b}\)↩︎ \(p\) is unknown but expected to be around 1/3. Standard error will be approximated \[ SE = \sqrt(\frac{p(1-p)}{n}) \approx \sqrt{\frac{1/3 (1 - 1/3)} {300}} = 0.027 \]↩︎
